Game play too short, but great game overall.

("Meet the Engineer" text appears)
(Cut to the Engineer sitting on his toolbox and playing 'More Gun' on his guitar. Next to him is a kill counter displaying 209. The Engineer is sitting in the bend of one of the pathways between the Warehouse and the Radar Dish in Hydro.)

Engineer: Hey look, buddy, I'm an Engineer. That means I solve problems.

(A gunshot ricochets off the truck near the Engineer; he ignores it.)

Engineer: Not problems like "What is beauty?", because that would fall within the purview of your conundrums of philosophy.

(Two more gunshots ricochet off the truck, close to the Engineer's head. He glances briefly at the bullet holes.)

Engineer: I solve practical problems.

(The Engineer takes a bottle of beer from a nearby crate and swigs it as the level 1 Sentry Gun near him swivels round and shoots an unseen Heavy.)

Heavy: (screams)

(The Engineer puts down the beer and continues to play. The Kill counter clicks up from 209 to 210.)

Engineer: Fr'instance...

(The camera shows a BLU Sniper in the background trying to sneak up on the Engineer)

Engineer: ...How am I going to stop some big mean mother hubbard from tearing me a structurally superfluous new behind?

(The Sentry Gun spots the Sniper and kills him. The Kill counter clicks up to 211.)

Engineer: The answer...

(A level 2 Sentry Gun fires and kills a Scout and an unseen enemy.)

Scout: (screams)

(Kill counter clicks up to 213)

Engineer: ...use a gun. And if that don't work.... [A level 3 sentry gun fires rockets] ...use more gun.

(The Engineer stops playing. A large explosion is heard and the Engineer grins happily)

Unknown Assailant: My arm! (from off-screen)

(The Kill counter clicks up to 214. A severed Sniper hand lands in front of the Engineer, who continues playing, the Engineer kicks the hand into the air upon which the level 1 Sentry Gun targets and shoots the hand)

Engineer: Like this heavy caliber, tripod-mounted, little ol' number designed by me...

(The Engineer kicks the hand, which is shot out of the air by the level 1 Sentry Gun.)

Engineer: ...Built by me...

(The level 1 Sentry Gun shoots another Soldier. The Kill Counter clicks up to 215.)

Engineer: ...and you'd best hope... not pointed at you.

(The camera zooms out from the Engineer as his Sentry Guns continue to devastate the attackers. It is revealed that the Engineer's truck is crammed full of BLU Intelligence, and that his "campfire" is in fact the burning body of a BLU Sniper.)

(Various screams)

(The Engineer's guitar sounds blend into the ambiance, before the piece ends with the Team Fortress 2 ending flourish.)

Gran juego. Nunca le había prestado especial atención a pesar de verlo en las listas de mejores juegos, pero como estuvo en descuento por el black friday decidí probarlo. De haberlo jugado en la época que salió fácilmente se habría transformado en uno de mis juegos favoritos de toda la vida. Aún así le reconozco el mérito. 

Fácil de aprender a jugar. Los desarrolladores han hecho un excelente trabajo guiando al jugador (explican cada detalle tenido en consideración en las notas de los desarrolladores).

Curva de dificultad: 10/10
Trama: 10/10

I played this game back in 2011, back when I was single. Now I have an awesome girlfriend who also enjoys playing video games here and there. I decided to get this game for her. So far she is enjoying it, barebones compare to the second but I believe that's the magic of both these games. When this game came out it was a breakthrough for puzzle plateforms in the first person perspective with a physics based engine. Still holds up to this day. Now I just sit back and enjoy seeing my Queen play it and seeing the reaction on her face when she completes a level. Must play for any OG!

非常好玩的游戏
无论是玩法设计还是剧情都非常好
[spoiler]光听G姐磁性的声音我就冲爆了！[/spoiler]
就是剧情里有一些坑没有填
剧透警告！
剧透警告！
剧透警告！
剧情大概就是GLaDOS（游戏里提示时很有磁性的声音）
G姐在被激活之后释放神经毒素把光圈科技实验基地里的人都kill掉了
就算没有被做掉剩下的人也被变成危险实验的实验品
但是有一个幸存者道格，他潜入实验室将实验人员名单篡改，你（玩家操作的）Chell变成第一个实验品
然后就到了开头拿传送枪，很多地方有的涂鸦提示也是道格为玩家做的提醒
Chell在困难中解决各种问题，最后到了G姐面前将各个核心扔进那个焚化炉
最后G姐被破坏，虽然已经被破坏，但是在Chell逃脱时下的命令还没有解除（抓你回去）
所以Chell刚出来到地面看到树木和天空就又被拖回去了
伴随着Still Alive这首片尾曲
[spoiler]这首歌真心好听，G姐YYDS 我永远喜欢G姐和同伴方块[/spoiler]
最后G姐的蛋糕也出现在了初始页面
自此Portal1剧情就完了
Portal2 道格看到你（Chell）又被带回去，随后再次也跟了回去，由于基地已经没有控制了，所以只能把
Chell进入睡眠状态保护起来 这时候就到了2的开头提示睡了999..99那么长的时间
本人了解的就这么多了，如果有错的地方可以留言修改~
[spoiler]只能说有生之年了，如果有3应该就是和G姐的约会之路了，希望真的能出3然后有个好的结局吧[/spoiler]

3.5 hrs of cake

Je n'avais pas en souvenir le fait que le jeu était aussi court. Environ 2h si l'on a tout oublié et que l'on fait les cartes normalement.

L’intérêt réside ensuite principalement dans les créations d'autres joueurs. Les cartes avancées étant un peu intéressantes , mais les défis étant à mon gout sans grand intérêt, se basant sur 3 défis : nombre de portails, nombres de pas et temps. Ceux ci étant sur les 6 mêmes cartes, l'on tourne très rapidement en rond à faire la même chose 3 fois.
Le plus gros problème pour moi dans ces défis est qu'ils nécessite l'usage de glitch pour être accompli, ce qui fait que l'on ne peut pas les réaliser soi même en réfléchissant, mais uniquement en cherchant sur internet pour trouver la solution.

Portal reste tout de même une grande référence qui aura marqué une technique de jeu à son époque, avec également quelques grandes références culturelles et un humour sympathique.
Son plus grand défaut étant donc sa durée de jeu très courte et son gout très amer d'un die and retry pour les défis inutiles.
Pour ma part : 9h pour tout faire.

Начнём с плюсов: это обычный, но очень интересный сюжет, юмор и эстетика неопределённости из-за того что нам по сюжету не известно ничего кроме GlaDos и о том что она натворила. Минусы: короткий сюжет, проходится за 2-3 часа, но всем советую пройти эту и второю часть. Моя оценка 9/10.

Old game but still good :)
关卡设计可以说是标杆级别的了，从学习到掌握到运用，需要思考但是不会困难，有一定挑战性。

这个游戏简直是教科书级别的神作。
一样的原理，不一样的关卡组合；一样的关卡，不一样的过关方式。
这个游戏才是真正意义上的游戏：益智、好玩这就够了。至于剧情、画面、音乐等等都相对来说不太重要，更何况传送门在这些方面并不弱。
很难想象在07年能做出如此创造性的游戏，它照比今天的一些游戏都优秀了不止一星半点。
那些快餐游戏，那些玩了让人高血压、悲伤、气愤的低品质游戏，在它面前简直就是屎！
这真是机械的工业品和创造性的艺术品之间最大的区别。
